<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>

<head>
    <title>Temperature Converter</title>
    <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64," class="bg" />
    <style>
        body {
            font-family: Arial, sans-serif;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .converter {
            margin: 20px auto;
            max-width: 400px;
            padding: 20px;
            border: 1px solid #ccc;
            box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
        }
    </style>
</head>

<body>
    <div class="converter">
        <h1>Temperature Converter</h1>
        <label for="inputTemp">Enter Temperature:</label>
        <input type="number" id="inputTemp" placeholder="Enter temperature" /></br>

        <label for="fromUnit">From Unit:</label>
        <select id="fromUnit">
            <option value="celsius">Celsius</option>
            <option value="fahrenheit">Fahrenheit</option>
            <option value="kelvin">Kelvin</option>
        </select>

        <label for="toUnit">To Unit:</label>
        <select id="toUnit">
            <option value="celsius">Celsius</option>
            <option value="fahrenheit">Fahrenheit</option>
            <option value="kelvin">Kelvin</option>
        </select></br>

        <button onclick="convertTemperature()">Convert</button>

        <div id="result"></div>
    </div>

    <script>
        function convertTemperature() {
            const inputTemp = parseFloat(document.getElementById("inputTemp").value);
            const fromUnit = document.getElementById("fromUnit").value;
            const toUnit = document.getElementById("toUnit").value;
            let result;

            if (fromUnit === "celsius") {
                if (toUnit === "fahrenheit") {
                    result = (inputTemp * 9 / 5) + 32;
                } else if (toUnit === "kelvin") {
                    result = inputTemp + 273.15;
                } else {
                    result = inputTemp;
                }
            } else if (fromUnit === "fahrenheit") {
                if (toUnit === "celsius") {
                    result = (inputTemp - 32) * 5 / 9;
                } else if (toUnit === "kelvin") {
                    result = (inputTemp - 32) * 5 / 9 + 273.15;
                } else {
                    result = inputTemp;
                }
            } else if (fromUnit === "kelvin") {
                if (toUnit === "celsius") {
                    result = inputTemp - 273.15;
                } else if (toUnit === "fahrenheit") {
                    result = (inputTemp - 273.15) * 9 / 5 + 32;
                } else {
                    result = inputTemp;
                }
            } else {
                result = inputTemp;
            }

            document.getElementById("result").innerHTML = `${inputTemp} ${fromUnit} is ${result.toFixed(2)} ${toUnit}`;
        }
    </script>
</body>

</html>
